content.title: Intro
content.content:
2005
Preceded by
2005
2006
Year
2007
Followed by
2007

Tolkien-related events that took place in 2006.

content.title: January
content.content:
20 - The second The One Ring Celebration is held in Pasadena.
31 - In Elven Lands is released.
? - Amon Hen 197 is published.

content.title: February
content.content:
4 - Previews of The Lord of the Rings (musical) open in Toronto.
19 - Death of Wi Kuki Kaa, actor originally cast as Ghân-buri-Ghân in The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King.
? - Vinyar Tengwar 47 is published.

content.title: March
content.content:
2 - The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II is published.
17 - Bob Papenbrook, who voiced Théoden and Gimli in the video game The Lord of the Rings: War of the Ring, dies.
23 - The Lord of the Rings (musical) at Toronto has its press opening.
31 - The Lord of the Rings 1954-2004: Scholarship in Honor of Richard E. Blackwelder is published.
? - Amon Hen 198 is published.

content.title: April
content.content:
7 - The Tolkien Ensemble publish their collected work, Complete Songs and Poems.
11 - Fellowship!, an independent musical parody of The Lord of the Rings, wins the LA Weekly Theater Award for Musical of the Year.

content.title: May
content.content:
9 - A Tolkienian Mathomium is published.
19 - The Ring of Words is published.
? - Amon Hen 199 is published.

content.title: June
content.content:
1 - Tolkien Studies: Volume 3 is published.
11 - Tim Hildebrandt, one of the renowned brothers Hildebrandt, dies.

content.title: July
content.content:
1-4 - The Gathering of the Fellowship 2006 takes place in Toronto.
2 - Pieter Collier is awarded the 1st Annual Northeast Tolkien Society Imperishable Flame Award 2006 for his immense collection.
13 - The Lord of the Rings: The White Council is announced.
14-16 - Tolkien Thing VIII.
28-30 - ELF 2006.
29 - The Lord of the Rings Strategy Battle Game: Legions of Middle-earth is published.
? - Amon Hen 200 is published.

content.title: August
content.content:
4-7 - Mythcon 37.
21-25 - The Oxford Tolkien Conference at Exeter College, Oxford.
? - Mallorn 44 is published.

content.title: September
content.content:
11 - Translator William Auld dies.
15-17 - Oxonmoot 2006.
18 - Children of Húrin is announced.
26 - Fantasy novel Here, There Be Dragons, featuring J.R.R. Tolkien as a fictional character, is published.
29 - Tolkien and Modernity 1 and Tolkien and Modernity 2 are published.
? - Amon Hen 201 is published.

content.title: October
content.content: 10 - J.R.R. Tolkien Encyclopedia: Scholarship and Critical Assessment is published.

content.title: November
content.content:
6 - Peter Jackson: A Film-maker's Journey is published.
10-12 - Ring*Con 2006.
21 - The RiffTrax commentary of The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring is released online.
27 - Anthony Jackson, the Tale Bearer in the 1968 radio series of The Hobbit, dies.
? - Amon Hen 202 is published.

? - Audiobooks of The Fellowship of the Ring, The Two Towers and The Return of the King, read by Rob Inglis, are published.
? - Actor Tyroe Muhafidin is born.




Years
2003 2004 2005 2006 2007 2008 2009
